allowedParameters.name: giftWithPurchaseType
allowedParameters.description: the gift type of the free gift. For example product or sku

allowedParameters.name: giftWithPurchaseDetail
allowedParameters.description: the gift detail of the free gift. This is typically a product or a sku Id

allowedParameters.name: X-CCOrganization
allowedParameters.description: Current organization context of the logged in user
